activities: Management of a web-based Learning Management System containing ordinary personal information (e.g. name, title, username, password) plus education transcript information for European customers and employees of Toshiba Medical Systems Europe. Only the data collected in TAMS' Learning Management System (URL's: http://mylearning.tams.com , http://mylearning.toshiba-medical.eu , http://mylearningpartners.toshiba-medical.eu) is designated to comply with the Safe Harbor Frameworks.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Ordinary user information (name, username, password) plus educational records specifically for the courses provided in Toshiba’s Learning Management System.
